data.title: Katherine Vaz – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Katherine Vaz. Browse Katherine Vaz’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
Above the Salt

A Novel

By: Katherine Vaz

Narrated by: Gisela Chípe

Length: 18 hrs and 59 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4 out of 5 stars 4

Performance

4 out of 5 stars 4

Story

4 out of 5 stars 4

An irresistible and sweeping love story, Above the Salt follows two Portuguese refugees who flee religious violence and reignite their budding romance in Civil-War America....

2 out of 5 stars

The generational stories, and the Portuguese immigrant story. Powerful.
